attributes.additional_details:
Stop the sticking plaster approach the nhs needs beds open for good after care from operations no patient should be discharged until all bodily functions are working correctly.

Strip out all the top heavy over paid management that does not contribute in any way to a patients recovery if we are suppose to be having a nhs system that works go back to the days of having a almona that was responsible for the budget.

Encourage more outpatient appointments not reduce them by offering payment to surgery's not to refer patients.Also instead of having to book a appointment to see your doctor how do we know when we are going to be ill instant same day access please if this means more doctors so be it.

Or be totally honest & say the country has to go private if that is the intention .

This is a petition that reflects all departments of the health service
